items.sentence: Since you\'re the oldest, you need to set a good example.

Tom claims he saw some aliens getting out of a spaceship.
Tom could never afford to buy such an expensive necklace.
Tom could only think of one thing he really wanted to do.
Tom couldn\'t understand a single word of what Mary said.
Whatever information you can give us will be appreciated.
We don\'t believe that Tom will be able to master French.
We stayed up until about 2:30 studying for today\'s test.
We\'ve been planning this trip for the past three months.
What\'s your favorite place to go when you want to think?
Instead of doing what needed to be done, Tom read a book.
Is it true that Tom was caught stealing from little kids?
Tom isn\'t the slightest bit interested in my suggestion.
Tom knew Mary wasn\'t likely to know how to speak French.
My parents would never allow me to go to Boston with you.
Tom wondered what was in the box that Mary had given him.
Tom worked from early in the morning until late at night.
Tom would like nothing more than to tell Mary everything.
Tom couldn\'t possibly have done what you claimed he did.
Tom is a talented guitarist, but he\'s a horrible singer.
The shirt that Tom is wearing doesn\'t fit him very well.
Tom returned to the living room with a smile on his face.
Tom has done nothing but complain ever since he got here.
Tom has had the same girlfriend for the last three years.

The ship Tom\'s grandfather was on was sunk by a torpedo.

Tom didn\'t let on that he knew about the surprise party.
Aren\'t you going to go to Tom\'s concert tomorrow night?
Tom never told Mary where he hid the money he had stolen.
Tom reads French quite well, but isn\'t able to speak it.

You\'re going to have to do that yourselves, aren\'t you?
I wish I could afford to hire someone to help me do this.
I wish I knew where we could find other workers like Tom.
We aren\'t going to give Tom the money that he asked for.
We have to make sure Tom knows what he\'s supposed to do.
I can\'t remember the last time we had a white Christmas.
I can\'t think of any reason why Tom would want to leave.
I\'m not the only one who can\'t stand the way Tom sings.
Tom decided to give up city life and live in the country.
Tom tends to get angry when people don\'t agree with him.
I hope that Tom doesn\'t want to go to Australia with me.
Tom knew that he\'d be very hungry by the end of the day.
Do you swear to tell the truth and nothing but the truth?
How did Tom talk Mary into helping him with his homework?
Tom has given Mary several gifts in the past three weeks.

Didn\'t you know that Tom was going to Australia with me?

I should\'ve told Tom why he wasn\'t supposed to do that.
Tom and Mary were the first ones to volunteer to do that.

You need to buy a new suit to wear to your job interview.
We\'re not going to give Tom the money that he asked for.
Tom seems to have packed everything but the kitchen sink.
Tom swore he wouldn\'t tell Mary about what had happened.
It\'s been almost three weeks since I got back to Boston.
It\'s been more than a year since Tom has visited Boston.
It\'s time for Tom to understand how we want things done.
I talked it over with Tom, and we\'ve decided to go, too.
I think that I\'ve already spoken to everyone about that.
Tom assured Mary that he wouldn\'t be late for the party.
I suggest that you don\'t say anything about this to Tom.
Tom realized Mary shouldn\'t be doing what she was doing.
The question still remains why Tom would want to do that.
I assume Tom will eventually be arrested for what he did.
If something happened to you, I don\'t know what I\'d do.
I can\'t believe Tom lied to my face about what happened.
Was Tom really surprised or was he just pretending to be?
Was Tom really telling the truth about how that happened?
Tom works at one of the city\'s most popular restaurants.
Tom went to visit his grandmother at the retirement home.
Tom will quite likely have to spend more money than Mary.
Tom will try to convince you to stay for a few more days.
Tom didn\'t want to play dodge ball because he was tired.
I\'m trying my best to forget about what we did that day.
I\'ve always wanted to learn how to sing classical music.
Tom thought it was rude to talk to Mary the way John did.
Tom thought that he could count on Mary to do a good job.
Tom told Mary everything he knew about what had happened.
Tom told Mary that he wanted her to babysit his children.
Tom opened the door and told Mary that John wasn\'t home.
Let\'s stop beating around the bush and cut to the chase.
Tom\'s mother thought he needed to make some new friends.
Tom\'s parents died in car accident on his wedding night.
Tom\'s parents have decided to punish Tom for doing that.
I\'m sorry that I couldn\'t live up to your expectations.
I sometimes walk to school and sometimes ride my bicycle.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t hear Mary calling his name.
Tom probably thinks that what he\'s doing is a good idea.
Tom promised Mary that he wouldn\'t ever see Alice again.
Tom and Mary both know that that isn\'t likely to happen.
Do you know the reason Tom was sent to the Boston office?
I knew that I was wasting my time trying to convince Tom.
I live in a community where most people can walk to work.
Tom and I take a walk in the park together every morning.
Tom and Mary both stared at John without saying anything.
Tom and Mary ate breakfast before their children woke up.
Tom and Mary have been through some tough times together.
Tom and Mary wanted to take a walk on the beach together.
Are you saying you don\'t want Tom to come to your party?
Tom understands French, but he doesn\'t like speaking it.
Tom gave Mary flowers and chocolate on their anniversary.
Tom had better hurry if he wants to get home before dark.
Tom filled the kettle with water and put it on the stove.
Tom fished a key out of his pocket and unlocked the door.
Tom leaned over and whispered something into Mary\'s ear.
Tom took the bottle from Mary and poured himself a drink.
The teacher made fun of Tom in front of the entire class.
I wasn\'t speaking to you. Please mind your own business.
I\'m not yet ready to be in a serious relationship again.
Tom and Mary hardly spoke to each other during breakfast.
Tom wants me to buy a suit to wear to that job interview.
Tom was accused of practicing medicine without a license.
Tom was accused of stealing money from the cash register.
The police told Tom to sit in the back of the patrol car.
Tom told me he doesn\'t care whether you like him or not.
Tom told me that he\'ll do that the way Mary told him to.
Mary is wearing the same dress that she had on yesterday.
I asked Tom how often he and Mary played tennis together.
How many people do you think will be at today\'s meeting?
Without Tom\'s help, I wouldn\'t have been able to do it.
Do you really think you can convince Tom to buy you that?
Do you remember the first time we went swimming together?
Do you remember when Tom said he was planning to do that?
Do you think Tom would teach me how to play the mandolin?
There were several reasons why we decided not to do that.
Let\'s hope that that\'s the last time that that happens.
How long did it take you to decorate your Christmas tree?
How long do you think we can sit here before Tom sees us?
I don\'t think anybody suspected you weren\'t really Tom.
I don\'t think Tom realized just how much Mary loved him.
I\'ll do the best that I can to keep that from happening.
I\'m not sure whether Tom has ever been to Boston or not.

What\'s the real reason that Tom didn\'t need to do that?
Tom tried to persuade Mary to help him with his homework.
Tom tried to sneak into the movie theater without paying.
One emu egg is about the equivalent of nine chicken eggs.
The dogs as well as their owners seemed to be having fun.
Tom couldn\'t hear a word that Mary and John were saying.
I\'ve always wanted to live in a French-speaking country.
Tom knew he was probably not going to be able to do that.
Tom knew that he was going to have a good time in Boston.
Tom didn\'t want to tell anybody about what had happened.
Tom didn\'t want to tell anybody about what was going on.
Tom doesn\'t drink as much coffee nowadays as he used to.
I can\'t tell you how many times that has happened to me.
All the songs we\'re singing tonight were written by Tom.
The two of them have been in Boston for over three years.
I wish that there were a French translation of this book.
Tom has come all the way from Boston to be with us today.
It won\'t be as difficult as you think it\'s going to be.
When was the last time you and Tom played chess together?
I\'m pretty sure that Tom gets paid a lot more than I do.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom would tell us if we were wrong.
I\'m pretty sure that it was Tom that I saw kissing Mary.
I\'m really good at figuring out these kinds of problems.
I was the one who said we should give Tom another chance.
Do you think you should be doing that without permission?
Does Tom still have that red sports car he used to drive?
I didn\'t have a chance to do that while I was in Boston.
I didn\'t realize my wallet was missing until I got home.
I ended up apologizing to Tom for something I didn\'t do.
Both Tom and Mary know that that isn\'t likely to happen.
Didn\'t you know Tom lived in Boston when he was a child?
I can\'t go out tonight because my parents won\'t let me.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t go there if you didn\'t go with him.
I can\'t believe that you weren\'t as impressed as I was.
I think Mary is the most beautiful woman I\'ve ever seen.
I still have things that I need to do before I can leave.
There\'s absolutely no chance that Tom will win the race.
Maybe I shouldn\'t have told Tom about what had happened.
Tom may not have enough money to buy everything he needs.
Tom and Mary won\'t be able to do that without your help.

Tom later discovered what Mary had told him wasn\'t true.
I think we shouldn\'t let Tom go to Australia by himself.
Why do some people consider it morally wrong to eat meat?
I informed Tom that I wouldn\'t be attending the meeting.
I think Tom and Mary both have to be told not to do that.
I bet you\'re going to tell me you\'re too tired to help.

This has nothing to do with what happened here last week.
This pamphlet tells you how you can lower the water bill.
Those boys over there speaking in French are in my class.
I\'m not sure that that\'s what Tom really wanted to say.
It made Tom\'s head hurt to think about all those things.
I don\'t think I have the energy to walk to school today.
When I was 18, I decided to take a year off from college.
Tom started working as a carpenter about three years ago.
Tom went to the drugstore to buy medicine for his mother.
I want a nice backyard where I can have barbecue parties.

Do you know whether or not Tom likes cream in his coffee?
Tom and Mary aren\'t likely to ever see each other again.
